title: Images | Saturday's 1.60 Bank Degroof at Brussels Stephex Masters
content: The Bank Degroof 1.60 m class over two rounds took place on Saturday evening at the Brussels Stephex Masters - and here is how it played out. Lets start with the happy winner - Simon Delestre on Chesall - leaving the ring after the second round. All photos (c) Jenny Abrahamsson.
